${project_name}.config.zombies.speedMult: How much faster zombies move (1.5 = 50% faster)
${project_name}.config.zombies.minGroupS: Minimum number of zombies that spawn in a group
${project_name}.config.zombies.maxGroupS: Maximum number of zombies that spawn in a group
${project_name}.config.zombies.spawnFreq: How much more frequently zombies spawn (2.0 = twice as often)
${project_name}.config.zombies.detection: How much farther zombies can detect players (2.0 = twice as far)
